HAI1100C - Elementary Haitian Creole & C.name: HAI1100C - Elementary Haitian Creole & Culture I

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduces students to Haitian Creole culture through the major language skills: listening, speaking, reading and writing. Only for students with no experience in this language.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures
